NASDAQ: GOOG) today announced financial results for the quarter and the fiscal year ended December 31, 2010.`` Q4 marked a terrific end to a stellar year,'' said Eric Schmidt , CEO of Google. Our strong performance has been driven by a rapidly growing digital economy, continuous product innovation that benefits both users and advertisers, and by the extraordinary momentum of our newer businesses, such as display and mobile.
